I am sure this is S02E02 and they aired S02E01 last Sunday (I missed it). The first season was re-edited and re-airing as Doomsday Preppers Bugged Out. I am torn whether to bother getting those or not, it is just minor differences...like snarky comments in new text on-screen.

Ep 1 aired on the 4th, ep 2 is scheduled to air on the 13th (see http://thetvdb.com/?tab=seasonall&id=255608&lid=7 - and other sites say the same). If you watch this episode, here it is clearly the episode titled "Am I Nuts or Are You?" and thus is ep 2 of season 2. I got it early because it seems to have been put on onDemand early on purpose or accidentally thinking it was ep 1.
